status.description:
The event status. Valid values are ``failed`` , ``completed`` , and
``in-progress`` .

tag.description: A string value that identifies the event.

events.description: Specify the ``events`` action in the request body.

server_uuid.description: The ID of the server that is associated with the event.

name.description:
The event name. Valid values are ``network-changed`` , ``network-
vif-plugged`` , ``network-vif-unplugged`` , and ``network-vif-
deletedplugged`` .
